Barrage.Name: Barrage
Barrage.Description: Deal 4 (6) damage for each Channeled Orb.

Claw.Name: Claw
Claw.Description: Deal 3 (5) damage. Increase the damage of ALL Claw cards by 2 this combat.

Compile Driver.Name: Compile Driver
Compile Driver.Description: Deal 7 (10) damage. Draw 1 card for each unique Orb you have.

Go for the Eyes.Name: Go for the Eyes
Go for the Eyes.Description: Deal 3 (4) damage. If the enemy intends to attack, apply 1 (2) Weak.

Hologram.Name: Hologram
Hologram.Description: Gain 3 Block. Put a card from your discard pile into your hand. Exhaust.
Hologram.Description (Upgraded): Gain 5 Block. Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.

Rebound.Name: Rebound
Rebound.Description: Deal 9 (12) damage. Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

Recursion.Name: Recursion
Recursion.Description: Evoke your next Orb. Channel the Orb that was just Evoked.

Stack.Name: Stack
Stack.Description: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile.
Stack.Description (Upgraded): Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile +3.

Steam Barrier.Name: Steam Barrier
Steam Barrier.Description: Gain 6 (8) Block. Decrease this card's Block by 1 this combat.

Streamline.Name: Streamline
Streamline.Description: Deal 15 (20) damage. Reduce this card's cost by 1 this combat.

Sweeping Beam.Name: Sweeping Beam
Sweeping Beam.Description: Deal 6 (9) damage to ALL enemies. Draw 1 card.

TURBO.Name: TURBO
TURBO.Description: Gain [B] [B]. Add a Void into your discard pile.
TURBO.Description (Upgraded): Gain [B] [B] [B]. Add a Void into your discard pile.

Aggregate.Name: Aggregate
Aggregate.Description: Gain [B] for every 4 (3) cards in your draw pile.

Auto-Shields.Name: Auto-Shields
Auto-Shields.Description: If you have no Block, gain 11 (15) Block.

Blizzard.Name: Blizzard
Blizzard.Description: Deal damage equal to 2 (3) times the number of Frost Channeled this combat to ALL enemies.

Chill.Name: Chill
Chill.Description: Channel 1 Frost for each enemy in combat. Exhaust.
Chill.Description (Upgraded): Innate. Channel 1 Frost for each enemy in combat. Exhaust.

Darkness.Name: Darkness
Darkness.Description (Upgraded): Channel 1 Dark. Trigger the passive ability of all Dark orbs.

Doom and Gloom.Name: Doom and Gloom
Doom and Gloom.Description: Deal 10 (14) damage to ALL enemies. Channel 1 Dark.

Equilibrium.Name: Equilibrium
Equilibrium.Description: Gain 13 (16) Block. Retain your hand this turn.

FTL.Name: FTL
FTL.Description: Deal 5 (6) damage. If you have played less than 3 (4) cards this turn, draw 1 card.

Force Field.Name: Force Field
Force Field.Description: Costs 1 less [B] for each Power card played this combat. Gain 12 (16) Block.

Genetic Algorithm.Name: Genetic Algorithm
Genetic Algorithm.Description: Gain 1 Block. Permanently increase this card's Block by 2 (3). Exhaust.

Heatsinks.Name: Heatsinks
Heatsinks.Description: Whenever you play a Power card, draw 1 card.
Heatsinks.Description (Upgraded): Whenever you play a Power card, draw 2 cards.

Hello World.Name: Hello World
Hello World.Description: At the start of your turn, add a random Common card into your hand.
Hello World.Description (Upgraded): Innate. At the start of your turn, add a random Common card into your hand.

Loop.Name: Loop
Loop.Description: At the start of your turn, trigger the passive ability of your next Orb.
Loop.Description (Upgraded): At the start of your turn, trigger the passive ability of your next Orb 2 times.

Melter.Name: Melter
Melter.Description: Remove all Block from the enemy. Deal 10 (14) damage.

Overclock.Name: Overclock
Overclock.Description: Draw 2 (3) cards. Add a Burn into your discard pile.

Recycle.Name: Recycle
Recycle.Description: Exhaust a card. Gain [B] equal to its cost.

Reprogram.Name: Reprogram
Reprogram.Description: Lose 1 (2) Focus. Gain 1 (2) Strength. Gain 1 (2) Dexterity.

Rip and Tear.Name: Rip and Tear
Rip and Tear.Description: Deal 7 (9) damage to a random enemy twice.

Scrape.Name: Scrape
Scrape.Description: Deal 7 (10) damage. Draw 4 (5) cards. Discard all cards drawn this way that do not cost 0.

Self Repair.Name: Self Repair
Self Repair.Description: At the end of combat, heal 7 (10) HP.

Static Discharge.Name: Static Discharge
Static Discharge.Description: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, Channel 1 (2) Lightning.

Storm.Name: Storm
Storm.Description: Whenever you play a Power card, Channel 1 Lightning.
Storm.Description (Upgraded): Innate. Whenever you play a Power card, Channel 1 Lightning.

Sunder.Name: Sunder
Sunder.Description: Deal 24 (32) damage. If this kills an enemy, gain [B] [B] [B].

White Noise.Name: White Noise
White Noise.Description: Add a random Power card into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

All for One.Name: All for One
All for One.Description: Deal 10 (14) damage. Put all cost 0 cards from your discard pile into your hand.

Amplify.Name: Amplify
Amplify.Description: This turn, your next Power card is played twice.
Amplify.Description (Upgraded): This turn, your next 2 Power cards are played twice.

Biased Cognition.Name: Biased Cognition
Biased Cognition.Description: Gain 4 (5) Focus. At the start of your turn, lose 1 Focus.

Buffer.Name: Buffer
Buffer.Description: Prevent the next time you would lose HP.
Buffer.Description (Upgraded): Prevent the next 2 times you would lose HP.

Creative AI.Name: Creative AI
Creative AI.Description: At the start of your turn, add a random Power card into your hand.

Echo Form.Name: Echo Form
Echo Form.Description: Ethereal. The first card you play each turn is played twice.
Echo Form.Description (Upgraded): The first card you play each turn is played twice.

Electrodynamics.Name: Electrodynamics
Electrodynamics.Description: Lightning now hits ALL enemies. Channel 2 (3) Lightning.

Fission.Name: Fission
Fission.Description: Remove all your Orbs. Gain [B] and draw 1 card for each Orb removed. Exhaust.
Fission.Description (Upgraded): Evoke all your Orbs. Gain [B] and draw 1 card for each Orb Evoked. Exhaust.

Hyperbeam.Name: Hyperbeam
Hyperbeam.Description: Deal 26 (34) damage to ALL enemies. Lose 3 Focus.

Machine Learning.Name: Machine Learning
Machine Learning.Description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.
Machine Learning.Description (Upgraded): Innate. At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

Multi-Cast.Name: Multi-Cast
Multi-Cast.Description: Evoke your next Orb X times.
Multi-Cast.Description (Upgraded): Evoke your next Orb X+1 times.

Rainbow.Name: Rainbow
Rainbow.Description: Channel 1 Lightning. Channel 1 Frost. Channel 1 Dark. Exhaust.
Rainbow.Description (Upgraded): Channel 1 Lightning. Channel 1 Frost. Channel 1 Dark.

Reboot.Name: Reboot
Reboot.Description: Shuffle ALL your cards into your draw pile. Draw 4 (6) cards. Exhaust.

Seek.Name: Seek
Seek.Description: Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.
Seek.Description (Upgraded): Put 2 cards from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.

Thunder Strike.Name: Thunder Strike
Thunder Strike.Description: Deal 7 (9) damage to a random enemy for each Lightning Channeled this combat.
